com.financial.entries
Contains the core data models for the budget management system.

    Class
    Description
    class 
    BudgetRevenue
    The base class for all budget revenue entries in the system.
    class

    Represents a revenue entry specifically for the Co-funded (Συγχρηματοδοτούμενο) part of the Public Investment Budget (ΠΔΕ).

    Represents a revenue entry specifically for the National part of the Public Investment Budget (ΠΔΕ).
    class

    Intermediate class representing revenues from the Public Investment Budget (ΠΔΕ).
    class 
    RegularBudgetRevenue
    Represents a revenue entry in the Regular Budget.
